name: Jim Schriver
coverLetter: I'm new, don't know much about the business, but I learn fast. Just looking for a foot in the door, so to speak.  I've always been a hard worker and eager to learn and advance. I am available at any time, and am looking for a steady work situation. I'm used to steady hours and such in factories, so I don't have any problems with being reliable whenever you need me.
contact: Please contact me at 814-389-5965, or hj1584@gmail.com.
